choices.description: Array of all the available choices
choices.title: choices

correctResponse.description: Array of the correct responses in the correct order

id.description: The id of the correct response
id.title: id

weight.description:
The weight of the correct response
Note: weights are not configurable in the existing component so we'll ignore it for now
weight.title: weight

correctResponse.title: correctResponse

alternateResponses.description: Array that contains the correct alternate responses

response.description: Array that contains the alternate response ids
response.title: response

alternateResponses.title: alternateResponses

correct.description: Indicates the configuration for feedback when answer is correct
correct.title: correct

incorrect.description: Indicates the configuration for feedback when answer is incorrect
incorrect.title: incorrect

partial.description: Indicates the configuration for feedback when answer is partially correct
partial.title: partial

prompt.description: The item stem for the question
prompt.title: prompt

lockChoiceOrder.description: Indicates if the choices can lockChoiceOrder
lockChoiceOrder.title: lockChoiceOrder

numberedGuides.description: If placement type is placement; show ordering indicates if the boxes are numbered
numberedGuides.title: numberedGuides

orientation.description: The layout for displaying the choices
orientation.title: orientation

placementArea.description: Indicates if the items can be replaced with each other or if they can be placed inside other boxes
placementArea.title: placementArea

removeTilesAfterPlacing.description: Indicates if each choice will be removed from choices after becoming a target
removeTilesAfterPlacing.title: removeTilesAfterPlacing

targetLabel.description: The label for answer area if placement area is enabled
targetLabel.title: targetLabel

studentInstructionsEnabled.description: Indicates if Student Instructions are enabled
studentInstructionsEnabled.title: studentInstructionsEnabled

teacherInstructionsEnabled.description: Indicates if Teacher Instructions are enabled
teacherInstructionsEnabled.title: teacherInstructionsEnabled

choiceLabelEnabled.description: Indicates if Choice Label is enabled
choiceLabelEnabled.title: choiceLabelEnabled

spellCheckEnabled.description: Indicates if spellcheck is enabled for the author. Default value is true
spellCheckEnabled.title: spellCheckEnabled

note.description: Indicates the note for the answer
note.title: note

toolbarEditorPosition.description: Indicates the editor's toolbar position which can be 'bottom' or 'top'
toolbarEditorPosition.title: toolbarEditorPosition

language.description:
Indicates the language of the component
Supported options: en, es, en_US, en-US, es_ES, es-ES, es_MX, es-MX
language.title: language

id.description: Identifier to identify the Pie Element in html markup, Must be unique within a pie item config.
id.title: id

disabled.description: Indicates if the plugin is disabled or not
disabled.title: disabled

disabled.title: disabled

customPlugins.description:
An array of objects that determine custom plugins.
A custom plugin is an object which determines how the button will look like (icon) and the event name that will be triggered when button gets pressed (event).
Example can be found at https://github.com/pie-framework/pie-lib/blob/develop/packages/demo/pages/editable-html.js#L425.

event.description:
The name of the custom event. It needs to be valid (only letters, numbers and "_" can be used).
PIE will emit the event prefixed with "PIE-".
Eg: event = 'client_custom_event_A' => the emitted event will be "PIE-client_custom_event_A"
event.title: event

iconAlt.description: The alt for the custom button icon
iconAlt.title: iconAlt

iconType.description:
The icon type.
Currently, only "SVG" is supported.
iconType.title: iconType

icon.description: The icon string. Currently, only "SVG" is supported, so it needs to be a valid svg.
icon.title: icon

customPlugins.title: customPlugins

choicesWithPlacementArea.title: choicesWithPlacementArea

choicesWithoutPlacementArea.description: Only available for the width prop: indicates the max width for images in choices and choices labels when placement area is disabled
choicesWithoutPlacementArea.title: choicesWithoutPlacementArea

choices.description: Only available for the height prop: indicates the max height for images in choices and choices labels
choices.title: choices

mmlOutput.description: Indicates if model should have mathML output instead of latex
mmlOutput.title: mmlOutput

mmlEditing.description: Indicates if mathML that's already in model should be editable
mmlEditing.title: mmlEditing

enabled.description:
Indicates the value of the item if it affects config-ui
(eg.: if item is a switch and displaying an input on the config-ui depends on the switch value: on/off)
enabled.title: enabled
